MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH42 Tranmere area of Birkenhead affecting properties in Church Road, Town Road, Tower Hill and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site to carry out further investigations and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00am on 20th January 2021
